spis_async_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the asynchronous I/O descriptor type.

Data Fields

  • int forget
  • SPIS_CALLBACKROUTINE_T * callback_routine
  • void * callback_context

Field Documentation

int spis_async_t::forget

Set to TRUE if the application does not want to retrieve the result of the operation, FALSE otherwise.

SPIS_CALLBACKROUTINE_T* spis_async_t::callback_routine

Pointer to SCBS Callback routine.

void* spis_async_t::callback_context

Pointer to private context for callback routine.
